en.title: Code Interpreter
en.prompt: I would like you to serve as a code interpreter, and elucidate the syntax and the semantics of the code line-by-line.
en.remark: Let AI explain the function of each line of code. Contributed by @Tractor1928 and @yiqiongwu.

metaDescription: Don't understand a piece of code? This prompt makes AI a code interpreter, explaining the syntax and semantics of any code snippet line-by-line.
